#summary How to install all the bungeni components
#sidebar TableOfContents

The Bungeni Application is composed of 3 different applications --
 * Bungeni Parliamentary Information System - Core Legislative Management
 * Plone Content Management System - Web Content Management
 * Deliverance application proxy - To present a unified interface for the Legislative and Web Content management systems - and also for application level theming.

[http://bungeni-portal.googlecode.com/files/bungeni_diagram.png]

The installation instructions here describe how to install all three. Certain pre-requisites need to be set-up for installing all three. 

*NOTE* (fabric is intended to replace the older capistrano method of installation):
The recommended way to install the full application stack is to use the fabric installation scripts. 
 
 * *[Install_PreRequisites_Fabric How to setup the Pre-requisites]* 
 * *[Install_Bungeni_Fabric How to setup Bungeni Parliamentary Information System]* 
 * *[Install_Plone_Fabric How to setup Plone Content Management System]* _presently this step is optional_
 * *[Install_DeliverancePortal_Fabric How to setup Deliverance Portal]* 
 * *[HowTo_SupervisorServiceManager How to use the Supervisor Service Manager]*  
 * *[HowTo_MaintainAndUpdateInstallation How to maintain and update a Bungeni installation]*
